[[/=]]

----

**Item #:** SCP-ZH-220

**Object Class:** Safe

**Special Containment Procedure:** Haren Kolva is prohibited from transferring the ownership of SCP-ZH-220 to anyone through gift, sale, or other legal methods. The location and condition of Haren Kolva must be tightly monitored to ensure his personal safety.

**Description:** SCP-ZH-220 is the house of the Foundation agent Haren Kolva located on Golden Avenue, Pine Grove Villa Area, Minnesota, USA. It contains a living room, a dining room, a kitchen, two washrooms, and three bedrooms. At the front door, there is a doorplate with the words 'Home of Haren Kolva' on it which cannot be removed by any known method. Despite SCP-ZH-220 having undergone several ownership transfers, Haren Kolva still holds ownership of SCP-ZH-220 and the associated land. The records of ownership transfer can be found in Appendix ZH-220.A.

Haren Kolva had lived in SCP-ZH-220 from 2006 to 2009 and stopped residing regularly and continuously afterwards. Currently, Haren Kolva has no living relatives[[footnote]]refer to the record on 2018/12/26, Appendix ZH-220.A.[[/footnote]].

**Addendum ZH-220.A：**

The following is the record of the transfer of ownership of SCP-ZH-220 between 2006 and 2018.

||~ Time||~ The Reason of Transfer of Ownership||
|| 2009/04/11|| Haren Kolva hit Andrew Pinch in a car accident, resulting in Andrew Pinch's death. The ownership of SCP-ZH-220 was transferred to Haren Kolva when Andrew Pinch died.||
|| 2010/08/20|| Carl Pinch died in the hospital due to acute hepatitis, the ownership of SCP-ZH-220 transferred from Carl Pinch to Haren Kolva according to the order of inheritance succession.||
|| 2011/01/12|| Morry Fragle sold SCP-ZH-220 to Haren Kolva after confirmed his ownership of SCP-ZH-220.||
||~ ［OMITTED］||~ ［OMITTED］||
|| 2016/10/03|| Kate Lehman died of natural causes at home. The ownership of SCP-ZH-220 transferred from Kate Lehman to Haren Kolva according to the order of inheritance succession.||
|| 2018/12/28|| Haren Kolva broke into Miles Chen's house, and killed Miles Chen with his knife in the fight. The ownership of SCP-ZH-220 transferred to Haren Kolva.||
|| 2018/12/28|| Haren Kolva shot and killed George Lehman who broke into his house with a handgun, then the ownership of SCP-ZH-220 transferred to Haren Kolva.||

Haren Kolva is punished on 2018/12/29 due to the violation of the Foundation Regulations [[footnote]]Foundation agents must not harm any non-anomalous entities with the distributed weapons under unnecessary situations.[[/footnote]], then the anomalous effect of SCP-ZH-220 was confirmed and being contained.
